)} {/* Features Section */}

Why Choose AudioBook Pro?

Advanced AI technology meets intuitive design

Smart Chapter Detection

Our AI automatically identifies chapter boundaries, skips front matter, and creates perfect audio segments with 99.9% accuracy.

Natural Voice Synthesis

State-of-the-art neural networks create human-like narration with proper pacing, emotion, and pronunciation.

Lightning Fast Processing

Convert entire books in under 30 seconds. Our optimized AI infrastructure processes thousands of pages instantly.

Universal Format Support

Works with PDFs, EPUBs, Word docs, and plain text. No matter your source, we'll convert it perfectly.

Professional Audio Quality

Studio-grade output with customizable voice options, speed controls, and chapter navigation.

Cloud-First Architecture

Access your audiobook library from any device. Secure cloud storage with instant synchronization.

{/* Comparison Section */}

AudioBook Pro vs Traditional Solutions

Traditional Audiobooks

$15-25 per book
  • Limited selection (20k titles)
  • Wait months for new releases
  • No customization options
  • Single narrator only
  • Expensive for students
  • No personal books

AudioBook Pro

$19.99/month unlimited
  • Convert ANY book instantly
  • Available in 15 seconds
  • Multiple voice & speed options
  • 10+ AI narrator voices
  • Perfect for education
  • Your entire personal library
{/* Pricing Section */}

Simple, Transparent Pricing

Start free, upgrade when you're ready
